name: Long Shadows (Featherwalk)
description:
Nimbus was never much of a prince, but now in the wake of his father's passing, and his lands in peril, can he prove his worth to the surrounding nations and secure the aid he so desperately needs?

A Game jam 30 day RPGmaker project. Created in 30 days. Still has some bugs, and I'm not sure when I'll get around to iterating on this concept, if I'm honest. But it's a fun little romp through a world I've been building lately. I hope you enjoy the parts of it that are complete and that work. 

The game is also available online here

Used plugins from Yanfly, Galv, and Arleq1n

used FES resource pack and MV cover art package, plus some original assets.
